title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Transformative Pedagogy for Education for Sustainable Development (ESD) Language Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can integrate three or more ESD core elements (cognitive, socio-emotional, behavioral domains) into language lesson design.
Learners design two or more language activities that induce changes in sustainability awareness by applying transformative pedagogy.
Learners can execute and improve sustainable language education scenarios in a VR simulation environment according to evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
